about: A passionate self-taught developer. I like to describe myself as someone persistent and purposeful; I love solving real-life problems, mathematics problems, learning new algorithms and optimize those algorithms further.
aboutSecond:
I love to make use of modern web technologies to build websites that look appreciable, feel fantastic, and function correctly. I am mainly focused on Reactjs for the frontend and Node.js for the backend.
I'm currently pursuing Meng at the University of York!
